detaileddescription.para:
Mark all messages of the conversation as read
cr
The SephoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.

Gets the partial list of messages in the given range, sorted from oldest to most recent.
cr
The SephoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation for which messages should be retrieved
begin
The first message of the range to be retrieved. History most recent message has index 0.
end
The last message of the range to be retrieved. History oldest message has index of history size - 1 (use sephone_chat_room_get_history_size to retrieve history size)
A list of SephoneChatMessage objects. SephoneChatMessage

Delete a message from the chat room history.
cr
The SephoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.
msg
The SephoneChatMessage object to remove.

Delete all messages from the history
cr
The SephoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.

Gets the number of unread messages in the chatroom.
cr
The "SephoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.
the number of unread messages.

Gets the number of messages in a chat room.
cr
The SephoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation for which size has to be computed
the number of messages.
